text: Hallowell may refer to: ==Places== *Hallowell, Maine, United States, a city in Kennebec County *Hallowell, Kansas, United States *Hallowell, Ontario, Canada ==Other uses== * Hallowell (surname) *Hallowell family * USS Hallowell (PF-72), a United States Navy patrol frigate later renamed USS Machias (PF-72) and then transferred prior to completion to the United Kingdom to serve in the Royal Navy from 1943 to 1946 as
title: Hallowell
